parameters.name: ExcludeKeySuffixList
parameters.description: The suffixes of the objects that you do not want to check.

parameters.name: KeyPrefixList
parameters.description: The prefixes of the objects that you want to check.

parameters.name: KeySuffixList
parameters.description: The suffixes of the objects that you want to check.

parameters.name: ScanMode
parameters.description:
The check mode. Valid values:

*   **1**: checks all objects in the bucket.
*   **2**: checks only new objects in the bucket.
